com.knowledgeplayers.grar.factory.ActivityFactory

type
class
Factory for activities creation

Static Methods

createActivity(activityName : String, ?content : String, ?perk : String) : Null<com.knowledgeplayers.grar.structure.activity.Activity>

parameters
activityName : Name of the activity, define the type of the creation
content : Path to a content file for the creation
returns
an newly created activity, or null if the given name doesn't correspond to a valid type
Create an activity

createActivityFromXml(xml : haxe.xml.Fast) : Null<com.knowledgeplayers.grar.structure.activity.Activity>

parameters
xml : fast xml node with structure infos
returns
an newly created activity, or null if the given name doesn't correspond to a valid type
Create an activity from XML infos
